meanings.definition: Absolvents: substances that dissolve other substances
meanings.sent1: The absolvents in the cleaning solution helped dissolve the tough stains.
meanings.sent2: Chemicals like acetone are known as absolvents because they can dissolve paint.
meanings.sent3: The absolvents in the solvent had a party, dissolving all the dirt and grime.
meanings.sent4: The power of the absolvents was like magic, making the stains disappear effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The absolvents worked like tiny cleaners, breaking down the stubborn particles.

meanings.definition: Absolvents: individuals who absolve or forgive others
meanings.sent1: The absolvents in the community always offered forgiveness to those who made mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She was known as an absolvent, always ready to forgive and move forward.
meanings.sent3: The absolvents at the church picnic forgave even the silliest pranks with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was an absolvent, capable of letting go of grudges and embracing peace.
meanings.sent5: In a world full of judgment, she stood out as an absolvent, spreading kindness and understanding.
